flavorText: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

foreignData.flavorText: Das Leben ist zu kurz, um auf die Dinge zu verzichten, die du liebst.
foreignData.name: Abschussfeier
foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um die Abschussfeier zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Ihr Beherrscher verliert 2 Lebenspunkte.

foreignData.flavorText: La vida es demasiado corta como para no hacer lo que más te gusta.
foreignData.name: Fiesta de lanzamiento
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar la Fiesta de lanzamiento sacrifica una criatura.
Destruye la criatura objetivo. Su controlador pierde 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: La vie est trop courte pour ne pas faire ce qu'on aime.
foreignData.name: Faire le lancement
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer Faire le lancement, sacrifiez une créature.
Détruisez la créature ciblée. Son contrôleur perd 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: La vita è troppo breve per non dedicarti alle cose che ami.
foreignData.name: Festa di Lancio
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare la Festa di Lancio, sacrifica una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Il suo controllore perde 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 短い生涯、好きなことをやらずにいられるものか。
foreignData.name: 打ち上げ
foreignData.text:
打ち上げを唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それのコントローラーは２点のライフを失う。

foreignData.flavorText: 좋아하는 일을 하지 않기에는 인생이 너무 짧다.
foreignData.name: 죽여주는 잔치
foreignData.text:
죽여주는 잔치를 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 그 생물의 조종자는 생명 2점을 잃는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A vida é curta demais para não fazer as coisas que você ama.
foreignData.name: Festa de Lançamento
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar Festa de Lançamento, sacrifique uma criatura.
Destrua a criatura alvo. Seu controlador perde 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Жизнь слишком коротка для того, чтобы не делать вещи, которые любишь делать.
foreignData.name: Торжественный Запуск
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Торжественного Запуска пожертвуйте существо.
Уничтожьте целевое существо. Контролирующий его игрок теряет 2 жизни.

foreignData.name: 召开派对
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物，以作为施放召开派对的额外费用。
消灭目标生物。其操控者失去2点生命。

foreignData.name: 召開派對
foreignData.text:
犧牲一個生物，以作為施放召開派對的額外費用。
消滅目標生物。其操控者失去2點生命。

name: Launch Party
originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Launch Party, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking creature during the declare blockers step, it won’t deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but that creature is dealt lethal damage, it’ll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.
If the target creature is an illegal target when Launch Party tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No player will lose 2 life.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
